title: An Attic......?
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>It’s a small room, but come on in.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Sorry for intru— Kyah! Is this an attic?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>No, it’s Ruby’s bedroom.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Awesome, awesome! This is just like the bedrooms in the anime that Setsuna and Lanzhu watch!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe, I’m glad you’re happy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Ruby, do you also have a secret hideout?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Those are always in anime too. I guess not...... It’s just your bedroom, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>What!? Um, uh, umm...... Then, why don’t we make this our secret hideout? Just for you and me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Really!? That would be super awesome! I love you, Ruby!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
